title: Jollof Rice
summary: A classic West African dish made with rice, tomatoes, and spices.

title: Egusi Soup
summary: A popular Nigerian soup made with ground melon seeds, vegetables, and meat.
instructions: Cook meat and stockfish. Fry egusi in palm oil, add vegetables and meat. Simmer until done.

title: Suya
summary: Nigerian grilled meat skewers coated with a spicy peanut mix.
instructions: Season beef with yaji spice. Skewer and grill over open flame until cooked. Serve with onions and tomatoes.

title: Akara
summary: Crispy fried bean cakes made from blended black-eyed peas.
instructions: Blend beans, onion, and pepper. Whisk batter and fry spoonfuls in hot oil until golden.

title: Pounded Yam & Efo Riro
summary: Soft pounded yam served with rich spinach stew.
instructions: Boil yam and pound until smooth. Cook spinach stew with palm oil, tomatoes, and beef. Serve together.
